name: UAutomationPerformaceHelper
doc:
Class for use with functional tests which provides various performance measuring features.
Recording of basic, unintrusive performance stats.
Automatic captures using external CPU and GPU profilers.
Triggering and ending of writing full stats to a file.

methods.name: BeginRecording
methods.doc: Begins recording a new named performance stats record. We start by recording the baseline.

methods.name: BeginRecordingBaseline
methods.doc: Begins recording a new named performance stats record. We start by recording the baseline

methods.name: BeginStatsFile
methods.doc: Begins recording stats to a file.

methods.name: EndRecordingBaseline
methods.doc: Stops recording the baseline and moves to the main record.

methods.name: EndStatsFile
methods.doc: Ends recording stats to a file.

methods.name: IsRecording
methods.doc: Returns true if this stats tracker is currently recording performance stats.

methods.name: OnAllTestsComplete
methods.doc: Does any final work needed as all tests are complete.

methods.name: OnBeginTests
methods.doc: Does any init work across all tests..

methods.name: Sample
methods.doc: Adds a sample to the stats counters for the current performance stats record.

methods.name: StartCPUProfiling
methods.doc: Communicates with external profiler to being a CPU capture.

methods.name: StopCPUProfiling
methods.doc: Communicates with external profiler to end a CPU capture.

methods.name: TriggerGPUTraceIfRecordFallsBelowBudget
methods.doc: Will trigger a GPU trace next time the current test falls below GPU budget.

methods.name: WriteLogFile
methods.doc: Writes the current set of performance stats records to a csv file in the profiling directory. An additional directory and an extension override can also be used.
